cab.content: Military Secret. .575From Viceroy, Army Department, 24:th May 1917.(Received 25th May 1917, 9 a.m.)7611. Mahsud operations. Gwaleri Pass was found unoccupied by ourcolumns on 21st. Column escorting convoys for,Wanaand Sarwakai reachedTanai on the 22nd a few shots only being fired at it. Gomal again reportedin flood on 23rd, delaying convoys. Mahsud lashkar in Shahur Valleyreported as reduced to 1,200 owing to (? dispersal) of Manzai and ShamanKhel contingents for supplies.
